price: 26. Tokkel isi buxah mará fanah gacca iyyeeh, gabul Íe beqra yusguudeeh solal hayyaheeh baahe.
arabic: فَرَاغَ إِلَىٰٓ أَهۡلِهِۦ فَجَآءَ بِعِجۡلٖ سَمِينٖ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: farāgha ilā ahlihi fajāa biʿij'lin samīnin
